entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `oauth_key` TEXT, `display_name` TEXT COLLATE NOCASE)

indices.name: index_user_oauth_key
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_user_oauth_key` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`oauth_key`)

indices.name: index_user_display_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_user_display_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`display_name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`game_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `key` TEXT, `pool` TEXT, `length` INTEGER NOT NULL, `start` INTEGER, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`user_id`) REFERENCES `user`(`user_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_game_key
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_game_key` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`key`)

indices.name: index_game_length
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_game_length` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`length`)

indices.name: index_game_user_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_game_user_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`guess_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `key` TEXT, `content` TEXT, `correct` INTEGER NOT NULL, `close` INTEGER NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER, `game_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`game_id`) REFERENCES `game`(`game_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_guess_key
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_guess_key` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`key`)

indices.name: index_guess_game_id_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_guess_game_id_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`game_id`, `timestamp`)

indices.name: index_guess_game_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_guess_game_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`game_id`)

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
    gm.game_id AS game_result_id,
    gm.user_id,
    gm.length AS code_length,
    COUNT(*) as guess_count,
    MAX(gs.timestamp) - MIN(gs.timestamp) AS duration,
    MAX(gs.timestamp) AS timestamp
 FROM
   game AS gm
   JOIN guess AS gs
      ON gs.game_id = gm.game_id
  GROUP BY
    gm.game_id
